00015 struct sass_options {
00016   // Output style for the generated css code
00017   // A value from above SASS_STYLE_* constants
00018   int output_style;
00019   // If you want inline source comments
00020   bool source_comments;
00021   // Path to source map file
00022   // Enables the source map generating
00023   // Used to create sourceMappingUrl
00024   const char* source_map_file;
00025   // Disable sourceMappingUrl in css output
00026   bool omit_source_map_url;
00027   // embed sourceMappingUrl as data uri
00028   bool source_map_embed;
00029   // embed include contents in maps
00030   bool source_map_contents;
00031   // Pass-through as sourceRoot property
00032   const char* source_map_root;
00033   // Treat source_string as sass (as opposed to scss)
00034   bool is_indented_syntax_src;
00035   // Colon-separated list of paths
00036   // Semicolon-separated on Windows
00037   const char* include_paths;
00038   const char* plugin_paths;
00039   // String to be used for indentation
00040   const char* indent;
00041   // String to be used to for line feeds
00042   const char* linefeed;
00043   // Precision for outputting fractional numbers
00044   int precision;
00045 };
